content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetTags path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/tags content: params

sum get all tags
desc get tags available for use in waf rule conditons tags describe aspects of an incoming web request and acn be used to create complex applicationlevel custom rules

200

stackpath provides shortcuts for the rules used in waf policies for the creation of more complex waf rules

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
desc a response from a request to retrieve waf tags
